description: This file defines a React functional component 'NotesList' that renders a list of note items, each displaying title, content snippet, and last updated timestamp. It handles empty list states and user interactions such as selecting a note via click or keyboard.

methods.name: NotesList({ notes, selectedId, onSelect })
methods.description: A React functional component that displays a list of notes with selection status and updated timestamp.
